EmailTemplate.description: This email template will be used to send an approval alert when the In Kind Donors account created
EmailTemplate.name: Account:In Kind Donors Approval Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval Request For {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Volunteer_Manager__c},
You received an account {!Account.Name} for your approval.Please click the below link {!Account.Link}.
